welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Egg Harbor, where small town charm meets stunning natural beauty. Known for its picturesque harbor and charming shops, we invite you to explore and experience all that our charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights operated by various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights operated by select airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cape May County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cape May County Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
